name: Momentum Missile Mayhem Fan Project
description:
As a young kid I played a lot of flash games. One of those games was Momentum Missile Mayhem 2. I recently decided I would try recreating this game in Unity, but with y own spin on the concept. Here's my work done so far.

You control a massive slingshot launching projectiles at a slowly oncoming army of cars, trucks and other special vehicles. Different projectiles types are available for different jobs, and special abilities change the nature of the game play.

Currently only has 1 level, plus a tutorial. Plans to add more levels, pickups, enemy types, projectiles and even combat arenas are in the works.
